meanings.definition: Wooden paneling used to decorate walls.
meanings.sent1: The boiserie in the dining room adds a touch of elegance to the space.
meanings.sent2: The old mansion was filled with intricate boiserie that showcased the craftsmanship of the era.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the boiserie was a perfect scratching post.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like boiserie, carefully crafted and displayed for all to see.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming through the windows illuminated the boiserie, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The act of decorating with wooden paneling.
meanings.sent1: She took great care in the boiserie of her new home, selecting each piece with precision.
meanings.sent2: The boiserie of the ballroom was a labor of love, with every detail considered.
meanings.sent3: The children turned the boiserie into their canvas, adding colorful drawings to the panels.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed like the boiserie, enhancing the beauty of the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The boiserie transformed the plain room into a cozy retreat, filled with warmth and character.
